Text: hey man, how do i do to watch/burn this film? i cant just ad it to nero and  burn it, i dosent work, plz help me!

mofazza.........Go to Burning Rom in Nero...click on Recorder in the top menu and then click on Burn Image. You can also mount it using Daemon Tools. It's a free program which gives you a "virtual drive" so you can mount it and watch it on your comp if you don't want to burn it onto a dvd-r. I always recommend for anyone to get Daemon Tools. If you're gonna get anything of torrent sites it's time you learn how to use the tools that well help the headaches go away. LOL....
NTSC And it will take 2 discs to make an actual dvd. the .nrg file contains the movie file which you then have to burn to another dvd to make it play standalone
